scripts.start: node utils/adopt-schemas.js && nodemon src/index.js -w specs -w docs -w assets -w schemas -w src -e js,md,yml,yaml,json
scripts.lint: node utils/adopt-schemas.js && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 spectral lint specs/booking.yml
scripts.lint-schemas: node utils/adopt-schemas.js && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--max_old_space_size=4096 spectral lint schemas
scripts.copy-resources: shx cp -r assets dist/ && shx cp -r assets dist/ && shx cp docs/*.html dist && shx cp -r examples dist/ && shx cp -r schemas dist/ && shx cp -r specs dist/ && shx cp node_modules/redoc/bundles/redoc.standalone* dist/ && shx mkdir -p dist/swagger-ui && shx cp -r node_modules/swagger-ui-dist/* dist/swagger-ui/
scripts.build: node utils/adopt-schemas.js && shx mkdir -p dist/specs && node utils/bundle-spec.js && npm run copy-resources
